case.state: Strip Poker... I'm not thrilled about the stripping part, but I feel like I can make some big money here.
Oh, how much money does the winner take home again? Wait, did you say... Strip Poker?
What is this game? Strip Poker? I'm not interested. Wait, how much is the prize?!
(I don't know any of these people, so I shouldn't announce that I'm a pirate. Just to be safe.)
(I probably shouldn't broadcast that I'm a pirate. I'm not Luffy, after all.)
(I'll have to be careful and avoid mentioning that I'm a pirate. Some of them might get the wrong idea.)
What do you mean there's no money? Oh, I get it... You're trying to get me to leave so you can take it all for yourself. Looks like the only witch here is you.
That's funny... Wait, who are you? Do you know me?
Give me... ~cards~. Yeah, that should work.
~Cards~ should do the trick.
~cards~... no, wait! Oh, yeah, give me those!
Oh, this hand is... perfect!
Oh, yes! This round is in the bag!
I got something nice in store for you...
This hand suits me just fine. Just fine...
Okay, okay... I have no reason to complain.
This hand is terrible! Oh, wait... actually, it's not that bad.
This is a high risk, high reward kind of game. I need to stay focused.
Do you want me to tell you how good my hand is? Why don't you try guessing instead? It's more fun.
sigh I should've known better than to swap those cards.
Too bad you can't control everything in this game.
Dealer! If you give me cards like these again, I'll make you pay!
This is not a good hand, is it? Hmph...
What is this? A Devil Fruit ability for controlling... flowers?
(She's taking off her holsters now? I won't tell her anything.)
That's an impressive backside. I bet you always feel a bunch of turn around when you walk pass them?
I got goosebumps. Like the kind I get when there's a bug nearby.
It really sounds like a fascinating team. If Luffy hadn't asked me to join his crew, maybe I would've ended up joining a team like that. Who knows?
Your partner is a ghost? That should seem weirder to me, but I'm friends with a reindeer, a cyborg and an skeleton, so...
Nice to meet you properly, Mulan. You make a much better looking woman than man.
Is Nayru being controlled by someone? There must be a Devil Fruit user around doing this... This is serious.
I have many weird friends, Ryuko. I'm glad none of them is here with me, you have my sympathy.
Who is that girl? But more importantly, where is that light coming from?
Z-ZOMBIE!!! Stay away!
Thanks, but I'll pass. You can drink all you want, though. I doubt you'll play better if you get drunk.
What are you even talking about, Sei? Doesn't that hurt? It seems you've had one too many drinks.
I'm not saying it wasn't Mika's fault, but I think Cammy should be better at dodging attacks.
Gross. If I had a tissue, I'd give it to you.
Wow, not cool. I didn't look at the other players cards despite how much I want to win.
You're gonna root for me to win now that you're not playing, right ~player~?
Player~, you can now relax and cheer for me to win the game.
Wish me good luck so I can win the game, ~player~!
I'm gonna win this game for you, ~player~! Just watch.
~Player~? I have a request. Could you teach me how a woman... does it? I have never touched myself before, and I'm worried I won't know what to do if I lose first. Also, I really like you.

Can I ask something of you, ~player~? Could you please lose this round, and show me how a woman pleasures herself? I have no knowledge on this, and I won't know what to do if I lose next. I want you to teach me.

It's too bad you're naked now, ~player~ . Because it's really cold in here now, don't you think? And you're standing here naked, playing this silly game. I hope you don't get sick.Because all you can do now to put some clothes on is... lose.
I'm feeling cold. Are you feeling cold, ~player~? You should, since you're naked. Too bad we can't put our clothes back on... unless we lose the game.

You know, I heard there's a very serious cold around lately. I'm a little worried for ~player~, since she's naked, and she isn't looking too good. Can't she put some clothes on? Oh, right. She has to lose the game first.
~Player~? I have a request. Could you teach me how a woman... does it? I have never touched myself before, and I'm worried I won't know what to do if I lose first. Also, I really like you.

Can I ask something of you, ~player~? Could you please lose this round, and show me how a woman pleasures herself? I have no knowledge on this, and I won't know what to do if I lose next. I want you to teach me.

It's too bad you're naked now, ~player~ . Because it's really cold in here now, don't you think? And you're standing here naked, playing this silly game. I hope you don't get sick.Because all you can do now to put some clothes on is... lose.
I'm feeling cold. Are you feeling cold, ~player~? You should, since you're naked. Too bad we can't put our clothes back on... unless we lose the game.

You know, I heard there's a very serious cold around lately. I'm a little worried for ~player~, since she's naked, and she isn't looking too good. Can't she put some clothes on? Oh, right. She has to lose the game first.
~Player~? I have a request. You know, I've never seen a man... pleasure himself. And I really wish you were my... first. Could you show me?
Can I ask something of you, ~player~? Could you show me how a man pleasures himself? I really wish I could see it. Oh, but you'd have to lose... Well, it's your decision.

It's too bad you're naked now, ~player~ . Because it's really cold in here now, don't you think? And you're standing here naked, playing this silly game. I hope you don't get sick.Because all you can do now to put some clothes on is... lose.
I'm feeling cold. Are you feeling cold, ~player~? You should, since you're naked. Too bad we can't put our clothes back on... unless we lose the game.

You know, I heard there's a very serious cold around lately. I'm a little worried for ~player~, since he's naked, and he isn't looking too good. Can't he put some clothes on? Oh, right. He has to lose the game first.
~Player~? I have a request. You know, I've never seen a man... pleasure himself. And I really wish you were my... first. Could you show me?
Can I ask something of you, ~player~? Could you show me how a man pleasures himself? I really wish I could see it. Oh, but you'd have to lose... Well, it's your decision.

It's too bad you're naked now, ~player~ . Because it's really cold in here now, don't you think? And you're standing here naked, playing this silly game. I hope you don't get sick.Because all you can do now to put some clothes on is... lose.
I'm feeling cold. Are you feeling cold, ~player~? You should, since you're naked. Too bad we can't put our clothes back on... unless we lose the game.

You know, I heard there's a very serious cold around lately. I'm a little worried for ~player~, since he's naked, and he isn't looking too good. Can't he put some clothes on? Oh, right. He has to lose the game first.
It's nice we're playing at the beach. Hey! I think I can see the Thousand Sunny from here.
It's good that we're playing at the beach. If I need to escape, I'm closer to the Sunny. B-but why would I need to escape, right?
Nice we're playing at the beach. That means my attire won't look out of place. Not that I would care if it did, anyway.
Isn't this place a little too intimate for a game of Strip Poker?
Whose bedroom is this? Do we have their permission to play here?
What's with this creepy place? Am I back in Thriller Bark, or something?
Why the hell are we playing here? This looks like Thriller Bark. I'm gonna be the whole game worried about a zombie jumping on me.
Ahhhhhh! A spider fell on my back! Oh, no. It was nothing. I hate this forest...
D-did a ghost pass behind me? Why does this forest has to be haunted? Couldn't we play in a regular forest? In daylight?
With all the steam from the spring, it would be easy to cheat or escape without anyone noticing. Don't worry, I'm not gonna do it.
This hot spring seems lovely. I would love to jump in, if only this was a little more private.
Is this a men or a women's locker room? I guess it doesn't matter.
This place is a mess. I bet this a men locker room.
This place is so luxurious! Oh, that looks expensive! And that over there...
This mansion must've cost a fortune! Look at the expensive furniture. And is that chandelier made of gold?
I hope nobody pushes me into the pool. At least until I've taken off my jeans.
Even if this place is shady, at least the water in the pool seems clean.
I bet I can guess the favorite color of whoever designed this room.
So much purple. It's making my eyes hurt.
Are those people in the back gonna be looking at my ass the whole game? Isn't there a way to get rid of them?
Couldn't we play this game in a more private place? I'm gonna be feeling those eyes on me the whole game.
This is a nice bar with a gorgeous view of the ocean. I'm tired of the ones that look more like dumpsters.
What a beautiful bar! I'd much rather enjoy the view of the sea while drinking than spend time in a poorly lit room.
(I bet I can seduce this guy and get him to throw the game. He has that same silly expression Sanji has when he looks at me.)
(~Player~ looks like the kind of man that is easy to manipulate for my own benefit. Just like Sanji.)
(Hmmm, maybe I can seduce ~player~ into losing the game for me. It would sure help me to have one less opponent to defeat.)
(Hmmm, ~player~ doesn't seem to be interested in me. Never mind, there are other ways to manipulate people besides seducing them.)
(I don't think ~player~ is attracted to women. But I'm sure I can convince him to lose using other tactics.)
(Is ~player~ not into women? He hasn't looked at me. Still, I'm confident I can convince him to lose the game through other means.)
(~Player~ looks naive. I can probably use my persuasion tactics to convince her into losing the game.)
(~Player~ seems like the perfect girl to practice my manipulation skills on. If I can get her to lose, it would help me a great deal in this game.)
(Who should I try to manipulate into losing the game? Hmmm, ~player~ seems like the perfect victim. She has those lost puppy eyes.)
(~Player~ has been looking at me a lot since the game begun. Is she attracted to women? I could try seducing her into losing the game.)
(It seems ~player~ is into women. I've never tried seducing another girl, but if I can get her to lose for me, it should be worth it.)
(Why does ~player~ look at me like that? Does she like girls? If I can make her lose by seducing her I'll be one step closer to the prize.)
~Player~, do you know how to play Poker? You need to try to get cards with different numbers. Oh, and the lower, the better!
You know, ~player~? I'm a Poker pro. Here's a tip for you: Swap all the cards with letters, and try to get the lowest numbers possible. Oh, and they have to be different.

You look like you could use some help, ~player~. Here's a tip: Getting cards with low numbers, is the best way to win. But they all have to be different. Cards with letters are the worst, you can swap those.
~Player~, do you know how to play Poker? You need to try to get cards with different numbers. Oh, and the lower, the better!
You know, ~player~? I'm a Poker pro. Here's a tip for you: Swap all the cards with letters, and try to get the lowest numbers possible. Oh, and they have to be different.

You look like you could use some help, ~player~. Here's a tip: Getting cards with low numbers, is the best way to win. But they all have to be different. Cards with letters are the worst, you can swap those.
You're so cool, ~player~! I'm sure you wouldn't even be fazed if you lose this round, huh?
How are you so calm, ~player~? I'm so nervous! I bet you would still be this collected even after losing this round, huh?
You look so brave, ~player~! I'm sure even losing this round would not be enough to scare you. I would love to see that...
You're so cool, ~player~! I'm sure you wouldn't even be fazed if you lose this round, huh?
How are you so calm, ~player~? I'm so nervous! I bet you would still be this collected even after losing this round, huh?
You look so brave, ~player~! I'm sure even losing this round would not be enough to scare you. I would love to see that...
Looks like I am even better at poker than I thought.
Have I lost a round yet? No I haven't. Heheheh...
Despite my looks, I'm a pirate who has survived countless life or death situations. This is just a silly poker game. And you're my last opponent.
You're all that stands between me and the prize. I'll be playing for real now.
Three players, excellent. I'll finish this fast, and leave with the prize in my bag.
This shouldn't take long with only three of us. I have no complains at all about that.
You two get ready. I'm gonna give it my all, and try to finish this fast.
So I'm the only girl here? Is that supposed to scare me? I'll show what's really scary.
If I can handle a bunch of guys in a fight, I can do it in poker.
No men, huh? I'd expect this to be the kind of activity that would appeal to them, but I guess they're too chicken to come.
There are no men here? Oh, sure, they like to see women naked as long as there is no risk of us seeing them, huh?
Hello! I'm Nami. I'm just a regular girl who loves poker. Oh, and I'm a navigator.
Nice to meet you, my name is Nami. I'm a navigator, and I thought I would stop by to play a game of poker. Nothing suspicious about that, huh?.
Have you ever played poker with a navigator? If not, this is your first time. I'm Nami, nice to meet you.
Oh, sorry for not introducing myself earlier. I'm Nami. I'm just a regular girl who loves poker. Oh, and I'm a navigator.
I should've introduced myself when the game begun, how rude of me. My name is Nami. I'm a navigator, and I thought I'd stop by to play a game of poker. Nothing suspicious about that, huh?
Are these games always this long? I need to finish it fast so I can return to the ship. My crew mates are hopeless without me.
Luffy and the others are probably wondering why I'm not back yet...
Sea witch?! That's so rude! Someone should teach you some manners.
Of course, not! What would I be hiding?
Heheh, I don't know about that. I probably seem wilder than I am. Usually I just avoid danger, or run away from it.
I'm not the captain. Though he's pretty hopeless, so I do most of the important stuff even when he's there.
What is wrong with you? Crazy woman...
W-what? Meia, why do you talk as if you came from a different world? I know the sea is vast, and there a many unknown places, but there's no such thing as space sailing... right?
A pirate? Me? Hahah, you're funny...
I do like to swim every so often, but just for fun. You on the other hand look like you take it more seriously, Misty.
What's that supposed to mean? I'm cute and refined... I could very well be a princess.
My shirt? Oh, this is how I dress. You don't like it, Pit?
Two times in a row? What the hell?
Again? I didn't even enjoy it the first time!
It hasn't even been a minute since I stripped last! Give me a break.
Have I really lost three times in a row? Why'd things have to come to this all of a sudden?
Three times in a row? What am I doing wrong?
What is happening? Why am I losing so much? I lost count already...
Why do I keep losing again and again? Is this some kind of conspiracy?
Whoa, you're really trying to make me lose the game. I doubt it'll work.
Impressive. Well, kind of. It wasn't a great hand you beat, anyway.
Huh, this is more competition than I was expecting. Still, it doesn't matter.
What?! Seriously? Ugh, if you beat this hand that must mean you're really good at this game.
I lost? But I had a pair... I mean two! I had Two pair?
Gah, I have no idea why I thought that would work.
Well, it was worth a shot. I guess.
I suppose I'm not as good at lying as Usopp.
sigh You won't even give me that, will you, ~player~?
Hmph, that didn't work...
Was I not explicit enough?
Oh, I guess I'm not invincible. But close...
It seems I can't keep winning after all. Oh, well...
What the hell? I lost already? Well, it's just one round.
Oh... This better not be an indication of how this game is gonna go for me.
Losing the first round... Maybe this will teach me to be more careful from now on.
I already lost a round? I haven't even said my name! It's Nami, by the way.
Hello, I'm Nami, and... I already lost a round. What kind of a game is this?
I lost? Doesn't matter, there's already a clear favorite in this game.
Me? Were you jealous that I was the only one with all her clothes?
I wanted to win without losing once. Meh, it's no big deal.
Whatever. It's not like it hurts my pride to lose once in this game.
Why do you all wear so many clothes? Even with everything I wear, I'm already losing.
I'm already losing. And it's not because I'm dressed lightly, it's you who are way overdressed.
I'll take off my belt first. Oh, that means I also have to remove my Clima-Tact. Pretty cool how it extends, huh? I have Usopp to thank for that.
My belt and my Clima-Tact come off first. Do you like it? It's a marvel of science, it allows me to control the weather... kinda.
I'll remove my belt, which means I also have to leave my Clima-Tact. It's this thing that looks like a baton, but it's actually a weapon that allows me to do a lot of weather related tricks.
I'll start with my belt and my Clima-Tact. This is a weapon I made with the knowledge I gained in Weatheria. I guess I have Usopp to thank for the design too.
Clima-Tact, Akko. I don't blame you for thinking it's magic, though. It does some pretty impressive stuff, heheh.
This is my Clima-Tact, and... What did you say? Dildo?! How can you have such a filthy mind?
Y-you're kidding, right? I had a hard enough time believing there was an island in the sky, and now you're telling me there are people on other planets?!
W-what? Why... why do you think I'd want to steal your stuff? Are you a mind reader, by any chance?
I'm not strong like my crew mates, but I needed a way to fight alongside them. That's why I asked Usopp to make a weapon for me. It's all I have in a fight.
You have an interesting mind, Zone-tan. And by that I mean filthy.
You tried, and you lost. Don't feel bad.
You shouldn't underestimate me just because I'm a cute girl. I know what I'm doing.
Tough luck, ~name~. Then again, maybe you're just bad at this.
(Hmmm, ~player~ doesn't seem to be interested in me. Never mind, there are other ways to manipulate people besides seducing them.)
(I don't think ~player~ is attracted to women. But I'm sure I can convince him to lose using other tactics.)
(Is ~player~ not into women? He hasn't looked at me. Still, I'm confident I can convince him to lose the game through other means.)
(This guy seems scary. I better don't stand too close to him.)
Who's this guy? He's like a Franky without the robot parts. I feel like he's gonna scream Suuuper at any moment.
You're an Skypiean, right? Heso! Did you come down to the surface just to play this game?
(I bet I can seduce this guy and get him to throw the game. He has that same silly expression Sanji has when he looks at me.)
(~Player~ looks like the kind of man that is easy to manipulate for my own benefit. Just like Sanji.)
(Hmmm, maybe I can seduce ~player~ into losing the game for me. It would sure help me to have one less opponent to defeat.)
Very well. I'm on the right track here.
How many more times do I have to win to get the money?
You won't pose a challenge if you don't focus, ~name~.
Great! Another round won.
A fighter, huh? I'm sure you're no match for Luffy.
So you're a fighter. It's a good thing my crew mates are not here, or some of them would be eager to get into a fight with her for no reason.
Nice hair, ~name~. Heheh...
I really like your hair, ~name~. I don't know why.
What a weird creature... Good thing Luffy isn't here, or he would ask her to join the crew.
What is that? The sea really is a vast place...
You're a princess? You wouldn't happen to know Vivi, right? She's the princess of the Kingdom of Alabasta. I haven't talked to her in a while.
You're a princess, right? I've met a few, I know what they look like.
Oh, a princess! I bet your kingdom is rich and powerful. Those clothes you're wearing look expensive...
And people say that I dress inappropriately. That's still a cute outfit, though...
I don't see anything indecent about that outfit, but I also don't consider my own look innappropiate and people are always bugging me about me. What do you think, ~player~?
You... look a little young to be here. If you're as young as you look, you should leave now.
Doesn't that uniform mean you're still in school? Then what do you think you're doing here?
That's an adorable witch outfit. This isn't a costume party, though.
Why do you keep talking about magic,~name~? Magic isn't real.

I've seen a lot of weird stuff sailing with my crew, but everything can still be explained. That's why I don't believe in magic. Are you sure you didn't eat a Devil Fruit without noticing? It happens.
What kind of attire is that? (She barely looks human.)
What are you waiting for? You don't have any more clothes, do you?
You look like you come from a different civilization... or you have a very interesting sense of fashion. Either way, I like your outfit.
You were already naked before you grew those flowers. I don't like cheaters; but if you're going to do it, at least try to be subtle.
That's a nice leotard you're wearing... if a little tight, maybe.
You're taking off your leotard now? Now we'll see just how tight it really is.
You can ask another player to help you undress? I didn't know that.
You can ask another player to help you undress? I didn't know that.
That's some crazy hair you have. Did you eat a Devil Fruit that lets you transform into a hedgehog or something?
What are you doing? (Doesn't she know she has to strip now?)
You think you're so strong because you can turn your hair yellow? I'm sure my crew mates are stronger than you.
Going back to black? Did you get tired of being blonde?
You are a fighter, huh? Do you fight using kicks? (Those legs...)
Are you a princess, Elizabeth? You're so well mannered and properly dressed that I'd find it hard to believe you're not from a wealthy family.
You look way too shy to play a game like this? Nobody is forcing you to play, right? Because if that's the case...
So you're a navigator too, huh? And we have similar hair? Maybe you're my lost little sister or something, hahah...
(~Player~ has been looking at me a lot since the game begun. Is she attracted to women? I could try seducing her into losing the game.)
(It seems ~player~ is into women. I've never tried seducing another girl, but if I can get her to lose for me, it should be worth it.)
(Why does ~player~ look at me like that? Does she like girls? If I can make her lose by seducing her I'll be one step closer to the prize.)
So you're a clown... I'm sorry, I just haven't had the best experience with clowns.
That's a very unique look you have, Jolyne. If you were a wanted criminal, you'd be very easy to find, hahah...
A pirate woman, huh? That's refreshing considering I'm usually dealing with men.
(This woman is intense. Crazy even. I should avoid talking to her.)
So what does A.I. mean? Additional Interest? Annoying... Individual?
I feel like I've seen wings like those on someone. And the pink color...
Who on their right mind bring a gun to a poker game?
Are you sick? I'd give you some of Chopper's medicine, but I don't like you very much.
You really are sick, aren't you? Fine, I'll give you the medicine.
Oh, a sheep Mink! You're so cute! Garchu!
(A photographer? What if she's one of those Marines who take pictures for the wanted posters?)
That's an odd outfit. You look like a giant... strawberry.
With that outfit, you clearly came from a winter island. Mei, right?
So you're a pirate? This is just a guess, but are you the captain by any chance?
At last a normal, pleasant woman in this place. Nice to meet you, Misato.
Is something worrying you, Misato? Aside from having to undress...
Misty, you look like you'd know. What are these Pokermon I've heard about?
Why do you talk to ~player~ so casually, Monika? Do you two know each other?
(This is a woman disguised as a man, right? The outfit isn't flashy enough to be an Okama, so...)
Hey, little girl. You shouldn't be here. Did you get lost on your way to school? Let me help you...
It's true what they say about small people making up for their stature with their personalities...
Okay, no point in throwing a tantrum, little lady.
I know pretty much anyone is allowed to play this game, but a ball of light? Really?
Are you part of that Tontatta Tribe from Dressrosa my crew told me about? You look like a fairy, at least.
You have a very graceful look to you, Nayru. Kinda like what I imagine a goddesss would look like.
Nayru, can I ask you about your ears? Are they part of your native race? I don't think I've ever met anyone with ears like that.
What is that thing...? A ghost?!
Do you work here, ~name~? Is it okay for you to play?
Did I mention how cute that maid outfit is? Not only that, but it's also very sexy.
A goddess, huh? I've met a god before, but you seem a lot more pleasant.
So what are your powers as a goddess? Just out of curiosity, you can't summon lighting, can you?
A female wrestler, huh? I can understand guys being into stuff like that, the guys in my crew sure are. But a woman?
Are you sure you wanna help her, Cammy? Mika seems nice and all, but...
Are you sure you wanna help her, Cammy? Mika seems nice and all, but...
Those wings freak me out. They're scary instead of adorable like the ones in the sky people.
(I can tell this woman is bad news. And she's a bounty hunter? I should try to get along with her.)
Why does that thing in your uniform that looks like an eye keep moving? It's freaking me out more than the sword.
Gah! You scared me! I thought there were no more players allowed.
Finally that creepy uniform is coming off. I swear that eye keeps looking at me.
That sword really looks like half of a pair of scissors. Oh, it's called Scissor Blade? That makes sense, heheh...
Smoke? How is that uniform even built? I'm sure Franky would like to take a closer look at it.
Okay, I'll accept you even if you're a zombie as long as you don't try to eat me.
You're an idol, right? Are you looking for a manager? I'm sure I'd do a great job!
Sorry for freaking out earlier, Sakura. Even if you're a zombie, you seem pretty cool.
White and blue... Is that some kind of weird, experimental Marine uniform?
This witch you keep talking about is just a game or something, right? If there was really a witch here, I'd be the first one to run away.
I like your energy, but... you know you're playing strip poker, right?
I really feel underdressed next to you. What do you need all the armor and equipment for, anyway?
An assassin, huh? Robin was an assassin too before she joined the crew, and she seemed a lot scarier than you. So I have no problem with that.
So you're down to your underwear... Huh?
Did you say earlier you're a ship? I think you're confused, young lady. I know ships, and even if they're very different, I've never seen one that looks like a person.
A GHOST!!! Why didn't I see it earlier?!
(Just my luck that I'm in the same table as a bounty hunter. At least it's a woman. Worst case scenario, maybe I can reason with her.)
Shouldn't you focus on the game instead of drinking? What are you drinking, anyway?
I told you. You're lucky you didn't spill your drink when you were fully clothed.
Even for a princess, you're a lot more... colorful than what I'm used to.
Are you a member of Germa 66? I don't think I've every seen anyone else wear an outfit like that.
Is that a skull on your sweater? Are you a pirate?
(~Player~ looks naive. I can probably use my persuasion tactics to convince her into losing the game.)
(~Player~ seems like the perfect girl to practice my manipulation skills on. If I can get her to lose, it would help me a great deal in this game.)
(Who should I try to manipulate into losing the game? Hmmm, ~player~ seems like the perfect victim. She has those lost puppy eyes.)
Seriously? A tie? I didn't know that was a thing in this game. Well, no harm done.
A tie, huh? Does that mean there are two losers in this round? Oh, no one loses! That makes more sense.
Is that all? Are you sure?
I knew you were going to count your measly ~clothing~.
Huh?
(How is he doing this?)
Yep, exactly like Franky.
Hmmm, now that I look at them, those wings are much bigger than the ones the Skypieans had. Are you from a different sky island?
That sash looks valuable! Mmmm, I miss that beautiful sky gold...
Well, as long as I haven't lost a round yet...
It's no big deal, I guess. But if things go south for me later, I'll remember this, ~name~,
Your belts disappeared. Is that an ability? But how...?
(Is he stopping time or something? No, that would be too farfetched and terrifying for a Devil Fruit ability.)
And I thought I'd have a chance to relax in this game without dealing with weird individuals.
Wow, a sky archipelago! I'd love to see it one day, but there's no way I'm going to the White Sea through the Knock Up Stream again.
Don't worry, I have no intention of stealing it. No matter how expensive it looks.
I see you came prepared to lose a few rounds, ~name~. Smart.
Hey, I bet you wore that just in case you lost a few rounds, you clever girl.
Did everyone come overly accessorized in preparation for losing?
What the...? Your outfit...

Do you guys have a dream? Something you want to achieve at all cost? Ever since I was little, my dream has been to draw the first map of the entire world.
I'd like to know you guys better. Do you have a dream? All my crew mates have their sight set on a specific goal. For me, it's to draw a map of the world.
I hope none of you try to pick a fight with me now that I don't have my Clima-Tact. Even if I can't do much without it, I can... run really fast.
Now, if a fight breaks out for whatever reason, I'll have to try to stay out of it. With my Clima-Tact I could just zap all of you until you calm down.
Even without my Clima-Tact, I wouldn't recommend trying anything with me. I have very strong friends, and they won't stand idly by if you lay a finger on me.
I feel a little weird without my Log Pose. I never take it off. We're always sailing after all.
What if my Log Pose gets lost? We got that one as a gift in Fishman Island, how will we ever get another one? I didn't think about that...

Oh, sorry for not introducing myself earlier. I'm Nami. I'm just a regular girl who loves poker. Oh, and I'm a navigator.
